Key Match Events: Bangladesh was bowled out for 183 in 20 overs
Sri Lanka chased down 184 with 2 wickets remaining
Kusal Mendis scored 60 off 37 balls and took 2 catches
Ebadot Hossain made his T20I debut and took 3 wickets
Asitha Fernando made his T20I debut and took 1 wicket
Post-Match Reflections: Kusal Mendis was awarded the Player of the Match for his unbeaten 60 off 37 balls and 2 catches
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka won the match by 2 wickets with 4 balls remaining
The match was played at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium on September 1, 2022
The match was part of the Men's T20 Asia Cup 2022
